channel.title: CVE Feed for Danfoss -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Danfoss -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-22582|2024-08-02T10:13:49.099Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 web applications allow for Reflected Cross-Site Scripting.

item.title: CVE-2023-25911|2024-08-02T11:32:12.743Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 web applications allow for OS command injection through the web application parameters.

item.title: CVE-2023-22586|2024-08-02T10:13:49.091Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 web applications allow for Local File Inclusion in the file parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-25912|2024-08-02T11:32:12.805Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The webreport generation feature in the Danfoss AK-EM100 allows an unauthorized actor to generate a web report that discloses sensitive information such as the internal IP address, usernames and internal device values.

item.title: CVE-2023-22584|2024-08-02T10:13:49.105Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 stores login credentials in cleartext.

item.title: CVE-2023-25915|2024-08-02T11:32:12.619Z -- danfoss -- ak-sm800a
item.description: Due to improper input validation, a remote attacker could execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

item.title: CVE-2023-22585|2024-08-02T10:13:49.105Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 web applications allow for Reflected Cross-Site Scripting in the title parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-25914|2024-08-02T11:32:12.736Z -- danfoss -- ak-sm800a
item.description: Due to improper restriction, attackers could retrieve and read system files of the underlying server through the XML interface.

item.title: CVE-2023-25913|2024-08-02T11:32:12.759Z -- danfoss -- ak-sm800a
item.description: Because of an authentication flaw an attacker would be capable of generating a web report that discloses sensitive information such as internal IP addresses, usernames, store names and other sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-22583|2024-08-02T10:13:49.090Z -- danfoss -- ak-em100
item.description: The Danfoss AK-EM100 web forms allow for SQL injection in the login forms.
